item.title: Interview with Kijk on AI in Medical Imaging
item.description: Interview with Wouter Bulten and myself on AI in medical imaging for popular science magazine Kijk, with a specific focus on our automated Gleason grading algorithm.

item.title: NRC article on artificial intelligence in medicine
item.description: Article covering some of the latest advances of AI in medical imaging, with specific focus on our JAMA Oncology paper on automated Gleason grading (on the cover of the Science section).

item.title: BNR Wetenschap Vandaag - Interview AI for prostate cancer grading
item.description: Interview together with Wouter Bulten on our publication in JAMA Oncology on using AI for automated Gleason grading.

item.title: NOS Tech Podcast on AI for Gleason Grading
item.description: Interview in the NOS op 3 tech podcast on AI for medical imaging

item.description:
Interview for the show ‘De zomeravond van…’ for Omroep P&M, which is an interview program for (former) residents of the municipality Peel & Maas. It partly highlights my work, but also some personal items.

item.title: BNR Wetenschap Vandaag - Zomercollege
item.description: For a special series of Summer Mini-Lectures Jeroen van der Laak and I were interviewed by Karlijn Meinders on AI in diagnostic pathology.

item.title: BNR Beter - Interview
item.description: Interview with BNR Beter on the digitization of pathology and the role of artificial intelligence in the workflow of the pathologist. Together with prof. Paul van Diest.

item.title: Interview with Prostate Cancer Patient Foundation
item.description: Interview with the Foundation which supports prostate cancer patients in the Netherlands. They supported my Bas Mulder Award application and were interested in my research. This interview gives a good overview of the goals of the project for a general audience. Note that the interview is in Dutch.

item.title: Report on Nieuwsuur about CAMELYON.
item.description: Report by Nieuwsuur on the results of our JAMA publication which showed that AI could perform at the level of expert pathologists.

item.title: Interview Regional TV at Alpe Hu'Zes
item.description: During Alpe Hu’Zes in 2016 I was given the honor to receive the Bas Mulder Award to continue my research. I was invited to speak a bit about my work during the event during the live registration.
